page.title: 05Cancer care in Denny D/Pace
page.content: {STRATHCARRON HOSPICE}provides care {and medical}attention for the terminally ill, and others too frail to manage alone. The hospice began as a renovated house and has since been extended. Now there are 15 beds available in 3 large rooms. There is a guest house for relatives to stay close by when the need arises.{Special {nurses}care for their patients in beautiful and tranquil surroundings. About 20 outpatients can be nursed. {STRATHCARRON HOSPICE}is funded mainly by donations. A shop and cafe have been opened by{ST.ALEXANDER'S CHURCH for the sole purpose of making money for the hospice. Many others help locally and employees of the region donate directly from ther wages. In this way those{DYING FROM CANCER,}the scourge of our age, can end their days in peace.
